participants.name: Heather Morton
participants.title: Sr. Technical Recruiter at Strategic Staffing Solutions

messages.message:
>On May 14/2015 1:04PM, Brian Cullinan wrote:
>Thank you for your interest, 
> 
> I have been developing software since I was only 11 years old. I started in VB4 and explored .Net since it's inception. Later I honed my skills on the web with PHP and JavaScript. I enjoy all forms of software development and computer administration. In previous positions a 6 month salary review has worked well, as it gives us both a chance to show what we are made of, without breaking the bank. I have a lot of experience with start-ups, so I am no stranger to bringing new products and technologies to market in a controlled environment. I would enjoy a change to meet more of the team. For reference, I would be looking in the ballpark of $180k. Thank you. 
> 
> -Brian 
> 
> On 4/13/15 7:06 PM, Heather M. wrote: 	 
> --------------------
> Hi Brian,
> 
> I came across your profile and I was very impressed by your background. I have a direct-hire . Net position located in Chandler. Please let me know if you or anyone you know would be interested in the position. I look forward to hearing from you. 
> 
> 
> Required qualifications
> •	5+ years of experience developing applications in C# .NET
> •	Senior-level experience in the following areas:
> o	Visual Studio (2010, 2012, or 2013)
> o	Mobile Application Development 
> o	ASP.NET MVC
> o	.NET Framework version 4.0 or greater
> •	Experience developing in the presentation, business logic, and data access tiers
> •	Experience in a Microsoft-centric development environment 
> •	Bachelor of Science degree in related field or equivalent experience 
> •	Ability to work in a dynamic environment with fast paced development life cycles and changing requirements
> •	Ability to effectively communicate complex technical concepts in easily understood business terms
> •	Ability to work effectively with other teams and vendors
> •	Ability to create clear, concise, and accurate documentation
> •	Proactive style showing the motivation to respond quickly to business needs
> •	Strong desire to learn and apply the latest technologies
> 
> Desired Technical Skills:
> •	2+ years of experience developing applications in iOS, Android, or Xamarin
> •	OpenGL ES experience a plus
> •	Experience developing e-commerce applications
> •	Professional Microsoft training and certifications
> 
> Additional Skills & Competencies:
> •	Excellent interpersonal and organization skills
> •	Must be a self-starter who requires minimal supervision 
> •	Ability to come up with the best solution for given requirements
> Ability to provide reasonably accurate estimates for projects
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Heather Morton
> Sr. Technical Recruiter
> 3131 E Camelback Rd Suite 212
> Phoenix, AZ 85016
> 
hmorton@vaco.com
If you get into some bigger picture positions please feel free to write me again.
